subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Domi, who recently published a memoir about his long career as an N.H.L. enforcer, is enjoying life as a fan as his son Max plays his rookie season with the Arizona Coyotes.
snippet: Domi, who recently published a memoir about his long career as an N.H.L. enforcer, is enjoying life as a fan as his son Max plays his rookie season with the Arizona Coyotes.
